main event: A UFO sighting was reported in Gainesville, Georgia on July 4, 1964, involving a bright circular object.
interesting points: The object was described as very bright and brilliant, illuminating the area., The object was silent and motionless during the entire observation which lasted for about 15 minutes., No previous reports had been made to the Air Force regarding this sighting., The physical evidence submitted (grass sample) was found to be normal., The July 15th incident involved unusual indentations in a flower bed which could not be explained.
